2014-04-21-buy-t-shirts.title: Buy my T-shirts!
2014-04-21-buy-t-shirts.author: admin
2014-04-21-buy-t-shirts.__content: Seeing as I've been working on some T-shirt designs lately, I have just set up an online store where you can purchase some of my designs on T-shirts -- both male and female fits in different sizes and colours. Currently you can purchase my Scott Pilgrim vs. Dark Souls shirts and my Planet of the Abes shirts and I will add more shirts as time goes on. If you have any requests for previous designs on shirts, just let me know :) Have a look here! →
